summary: Captain America Costume with Shield, there wasnt up already so i uploaded mine :D
descriptionHtml:
Captain America Costume with Shield, there wasnt up already so i uploaded mine :D

All the armour pieces can be made at any forge for 1 gold, and the shield you can only get through the console atm, will work on it though to make it craftable :D

Make sure the textures are in: Data, Textures, Clothes, Captain America

I recommend you use this mod as it works perfectly with the suit and its awesome that you can throw it aswell-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27497/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D27497
author: Decolbster
